effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Hits twice in the same turn. Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
